name: AutoPlay Media Studio 6 Project
summary: An AM6 file is a project created by Indigo Rose AutoPlay Media Studio (version 6 and later), a visual development tool used to build interactive applications without writing extensive code. It contains all the resources, settings, and scripting code for a project, including menus, buttons, images, videos, and other elements that make up the user interface and behavior of the application.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: AM6 file open in Indigo Rose AutoPlay Media Studio 9
